parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The Bluetooth address of the adapter in format XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX

parameter.name: backgroundDiscovery
parameter.label: Background Discovery
parameter.description: Whether this adapter performs background discovery of Bluetooth devices

parameter.name: inactiveDeviceCleanupInterval
parameter.label: Device Cleanup Interval
parameter.description: How often device cleanup is performed

parameter.name: inactiveDeviceCleanupThreshold
parameter.label: Device Cleanup Threshold
parameter.description: Timespan a device can remain radio silent before it is eligible for cleanup

parameter.name: lazyScan
parameter.label: Lazy Scan
parameter.description: Disables re-querying of GATT services from already known devices when scanning
